item.title: 5 European stocks to watch this earnings season as Trump's tariffs hit
item.description: The scale of President Donald Trump's tariffs has exceeded even the most bearish forecasts — and could impact these five major European firms.

item.title: The biggest questions facing Big Tech ahead of earnings
item.description: All of the megacap companies have significant exposure to President Donald Trump's sweeping tariffs, which will be a major topic on earnings calls.

item.title: Netflix maintained its 2025 guidance. That may not be the sign of confidence it seems
item.description: Netflix's choice not to bump guidance suggests caution despite the company predicting limited effect from macroeconomic turbulence.

item.title: Netflix posts major earnings beat as revenue grows 13% in first quarter
item.description: The report marks the first time Netflix did not disclose quarterly subscriber data, as it shifts its strategy to focus on revenue and other metrics.

item.title: American Express’ wealthy cardholders are mostly untouched by tariff jitters
item.description: American Express results show that the company's wealthier customers may insulate it somewhat from concerns that tariffs and stubborn inflation have c...
